title: Help, I can't launch League.
body: I can't launch League it, I was able to launch the game before, but my story was cut short. Now whenever I try to launch it reads as followed, C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\libcrypto-1_1.dll and then text in my primary language. May I get some advice or someone to help me get rid of this bug?

replies.body: Thank you so much! This helped me a lot!

Don't worry friend, we just had to wait for volume II.  This is likely being caused by a security setting preventing your game files from being accessed.  Run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to resolve this.

There's a chance that the previous block might have not installed your game properly as well.  In that case, you might need to download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to repatch!
